definition: a large entrance or reception room or area
details:
noun
- a large entrance or reception room or area
= synonyms: anteroom
- a college or university building containing living quarters for students
= synonyms: dormitory, dorm, residence hall, student residence
- a large building for meetings or entertainment
- a large room for gatherings or entertainment
= example: a large room for gatherings or entertainment
- a large building used by a college or university for teaching or research
= example: a large building used by a college or university for teaching or research
- an interior passage or corridor onto which rooms open
= example: an interior passage or corridor onto which rooms open
= synonyms: hallway
- the large room of a manor or castle
= synonyms: manor hall
- a large and imposing house
= synonyms: residence
